name: Animal Football
overview: The preparations for the most exiting happening of the year are weell on there way. The biggest football match of all times is going to start. FC Wild Dogs has been challenged by SV Lion Rocks. The coaches of both teams are still thinking about the final line-up. Today is the day, the match is going to start... who will win !!! Animal Football is a puzzle game featuring a half-hour cartoon about two animal football teams playing a game against each other. Gameplay in the original PlayStation release consists of slide puzzles as well a colouring activity.
